archimate:Principle.name: DP07 - Ensure Compliance with EU Legal Frameworks and Norms
archimate:Principle.documentation:
This design principle provides guidance and mechanisms that ensure compliance with applicable EU laws while safeguarding fundamental rights and promoting fair competition.
Core concepts: European legal and regulatory standards, compliance with sectoral regulations, governance and legal accountability.
Best Practices. In the event of specific occurrences within a data space, a systematic approach is necessary, including defining the scope and context of relevant regulations, identifying applicable laws, and allocating roles and responsibilities. Organizations should implement technical and organizational measures from the outset of any data processing activities, and establish regular monitoring and assessment tools to facilitate ongoing compliance and continuous improvement.
